description:
Windows 10 is the new innovative operating system from Microsoft that you have been waiting for! Microsoft has learned a lot since releasing Windows 8 and introduced all the features that we wanted. Get to know the new interface, start menu, browser, a unique personal assistant Cortana and a brand new browser - Microsoft Edge. Master all new Windows 10 features today! Get a free upgrade to Windows 10.

This course is based on the final version of Windows 10 (not beta, preview etc.) and includes real world examples and tests of Windows 10 features and apps!

Why Upgrade?

It is FREE! Yes, no strings attached! You can get a full version of Windows 10 as an upgrade from Windows 7 and 8.1. You will love Windows 10 - it is faster, better and more polished.

What will I learn?

  • Learn how to install Windows 10
  • Upgrade from Windows 7 and 8
  • Understand Windows 10 Editions
  • Master The New Awesome Interface
  • Tweak The Start Menu
  • Add Cool Apps Using Windows Store
  • Customize Windows 10 Settings
  • Learn About Security Features
  • Meet The New Personal Assistant Cortana
  • Start Using MS Edge - The Next Generation for IE
  • Make Back-ups And Recover Windows 10
  • Tips And Tricks

Contents and Overview

In over 5 hours of content including more than 50 lectures this course covers basic and advanced features of Microsoft Windows 10.

We start from scratch discussing all installation and upgrade options, the new interface and start menu, user accounts, computer settings and network features.

Learn the brand new Windows 10 today! Join now.
title: Windows 10 Crash Course: Beginner to Advanced
